project_plan.name: Multiple-Choice Quiz Game in Python
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. The questions and answers will be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Design the quiz structure including questions and answers stored in a variable
Implement functionality to ask questions and collect user responses
Implement score tracking as users answer questions
Implement functionality to display the score at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz implementation to verify its correctness
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
